name: Antarctic (Brent Silby Games)
description:
Antarctic was designed by Brent Silby in 2003. It was coded in Javascript, which was unusual at the time, given that most browser games in that era were written in Flash.  It is a pleasant, arcade themed platform game.

Use arrow keys and Z to jump/fly. Catch all the hearts. Holding the jump button while in the air will allow the penguin to glide.
